name: Blight (itch)
description:
Out run The Blight for as long as you can!

Help guide the Pure Blue Orb through the labyrinth by rotating tiles to open up new paths.

Be careful to avoid Blighted Red Orbs, as they share paths and slow down Blue if they hit them.

You control the environment. Rotate tiles by clicking on them.

The Blight has reached out and corrupted some tiles. These tiles will not respond with commands you give them or will just rotate on their own. Some will outright destroy Blue!

Destroying Reds earn you points and you can lead Reds to collide with each other to score more points!
